def append(self,
               other: Union[List["Node"],
                            List["Edge"]],
               forward=None,
               reverse=None) -> List["Edge"]:
        result = []
        for o in other:
            if isinstance(o, Edge):
                o.forward = forward if forward else o.forward
                o.reverse = reverse if reverse else o.reverse
                self._attrs = o.attrs.copy()
                result.append(o)
            else:
                result.append(
                    Edge(
                        o,
                        forward=forward,
                        reverse=reverse,
                        **self._attrs))
        return result
